p: The essential oil and the extracts (ethanolic and aqueous) of Ocimum micranthum leaves showed a bacteriostatic effect against Staphylococcus aureus, Bacillus subtilis, and Pseudomonas aeruginosa. The bacteriostatic effect against Gram-positive and Gram-negative bacteria, at the same concentration, suggests that the chemical composition of the extracts and its mechanism of action had a bacteriostatic effect that was independent of the chemistry of the cell wall of the microorganisms, which in other studies has been reported to be a factor.
